aboutProjectPage.title: About the project
aboutProjectPage.intro: The Good Boy Foundation is dedicated to improving the lives of dogs in Žilina, Slovakia. We rescue abandoned, abused and homeless dogs, providing them with medical care, shelter and love they deserve. Our mission is to give these loyal companions a second chance at life by finding them loving homes. In addition to rescue and rehabilitation, we also focus on supporting responsible pet ownership and animal protection through educational and community programs.
aboutProjectPage.mission: Our work is made possible thanks to the support of passionate volunteers, generous donors and a community that cares deeply about animal welfare. We also organize neutering and sterilization initiatives to address the problem of stray dogs and ensure long-term impact. At the Good Boy Foundation, we believe that every dog deserves a safe, loving home and a happy life. Join us and help us make a difference - whether by volunteering, donating or adopting a furry friend. Together we can create a better future for dogs in Žilina.
seo.home.title: Support Slovak Dog Shelters
seo.home.description: Help Slovak dog shelters with your donation. The GoodBoy Foundation supports animal welfare and improves the lives of shelter dogs across Slovakia.
seo.home.keywords: dog shelter Slovakia, animal donation, GoodBoy Foundation, Žilina dog rescue

seo.donate.description: Donate to Slovak dog shelters. Choose a specific shelter or contribute to the entire foundation. Every donation makes a difference.
seo.donate.keywords: donate dogs Slovakia, shelter donation, animal charity
